TEXT.TITLE: NUCLEAR METALS <NUCM> GETS ARMY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Nuclear Metals Inc said it has received a 6,300,000 dlr U.S. Army contract for 105 millimeter depleted uranium penetrators used as ammunition for the M-1 tank. Reuter
